newsitem.title: UK: INTERVIEW-ICI says price cycle at bottom.
newsitem.headline: INTERVIEW-ICI says price cycle at bottom.

text.p: Imperial Chemical Industries Plc said on Thursday industrial chemical prices had reached the bottom of the economic cycle.

"There is evidence that prices in a number of industrial chemicals went through the bottom of the pendulum swing in the second quarter," chief financial officer Alan Spall told Reuters in a telephone interview.
He said titanium dioxide prices showed some evidence of hardening, while in chlorine, which is the main feedstock for PVC, prices "are moving up, but somewhat slowly".
Spall said there were signs of stabilisation in acrylics and polyurethanes, after a subdued first half.
